alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 8:18AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Significant blowing and drifting snow reducing visibility to one-quarter mile visibility or less at times. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 15 to 35 below zero Tuesday night through Friday morning.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
